arts.ttl: Lionel Messi nearly stuns Chicago with an unthinkable shot that missed in record-breaking Inter Miami clash
arts.sum: The Inter Miami No. 10, sidelined by injury during the team's prior two trips to Chicago, finally took the stage Sunday, drawing a jaw-dropping 62,358 fans-a new franchise record. Lionel Messi keeps stealing the spotlight, and though Inter Miami settled for a 0-0 stalemate against the Chicago Fire, the Argentine maestro nearly unleashed a breathtaking goal in MLS -one that could have ranked among his all-time masterpieces.

arts.ttl: Messi 'changing how world sees MLS' with Miami
arts.sum: Inter Miami coach Javier Mascherano credited Lionel Messi for impacting the growth of Major League Soccer since signing with the club in 2023, but quickly added that more progress can be made.

arts.ttl: Javier Mascherano Under Pressure at Inter Miami FC: Takeaways From Draw With Chicago Fire FC
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF slipped down the MLS Eastern Conference table after a scoreless draw with Chicago Fire FC on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami CF 0–0 Chicago Fire FC: Player Ratings As Herons Shutout for First Time in 2025
arts.sum: Oscar Ustari made seven saves as Inter Miami held on for a point against Chicago Fire FC.

arts.ttl: Messi, Inter Miami finish in scoreless draw with Chicago
arts.sum: The Fire’s best chance came in the 88th minute when Jonathan Bamba’s point-blank shot was stopped by Inter Miami keeper Oscar Ustari. Messi did not play because of injuries the past two times Inter Miami visited Chicago, but Sunday’s match drew 62,358 fans, many of them clad in the visiting club’s pink home tops.

arts.ttl: De Bruyne wanted by Inter Miami - Monday's gossip
arts.sum: Inter Miami want Kevin de Bruyne, Liverpool's Luis Diaz attracts interest and Everton enter the race to sign Liam Delap.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami 'very interested in signing Kevin De Bruyne on a free transfer' after Man City star announced he will leave club at the end of the season
arts.sum: Inter Miami are reportedly 'very interested' in the possibility of signing Manchester City midfielder Kevin De Bruyne in the summer.

arts.ttl: David Beckham picks up on wife Victoria's reaction as he says 'how dare they?'
arts.sum: David Beckham was in attendance to watch his Inter Miami side take on Los Angeles FC in the CONCACAF Champions Cup, and the former England captain was in a state of panic throughout

arts.ttl: Inter Miami Predicted Lineup vs Chicago Fire
arts.sum: Will Inter Miami be able to play with energy after a draining victory over LAFC in Concacaf Champions Cup?

arts.ttl: Sunday's Major League Soccer predictions including Chicago Fire vs. Inter Miami
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Major League Soccer fixtures, including Chicago Fire vs. Inter Miami.
